features.subtitle: Discover how FineTuner simplifies every step of the fine-tuning process
features.importDesc: Easily import your documents, articles, FAQs, or any other text content to build your knowledge base.
features.datasetDesc: Automatically transform your content into perfectly formatted question-answer pairs for fine-tuning.

features.analyticsDesc: Evaluate the quality of your fine-tuned models and identify improvement opportunities with our analysis tools.

subtitle.part1: Instantly transform PDF, YouTube, and websites into powerful AI assistants

hero.ctaCaption: Get started in 60 seconds. No expertise required.

introduction.title: What is FineTuner?
introduction.paragraph1: FineTuner is your gateway to truly personalized AI. In just a few clicks, transform your unique content (texts, PDFs, YouTube videos...) into powerful AI models, ChatGPT or Claude.
introduction.paragraph2: Everything happens directly on your own OpenAI or Anthropic account. Forget complex manual configuration: you retrieve a fine-tuned model, ready to be integrated and reflect the DNA of your brand or project.

steps.title: 1. Connect Your Content
steps.description: Easily import PDFs, texts, video transcripts... The source of your future AI.

steps.title: 2. Behind-the-Scenes Magic
steps.description: Click "Launch". Our platform prepares, formats, and trains the model for you.

steps.title: 3. Your Model, Your Ownership
steps.description: Retrieve your fine-tuned AI (e.g., "AI_Marketing_Fun") on your OpenAI/Anthropic account, ready to use.

chatExamples.headline: See the Magic in Action
chatExamples.title: Fine-Tuned AI in Conversation
chatExamples.description: Discover how your personalized AI can respond, assist, or even entertain, adopting the tone and knowledge YOU gave it.

messages.text: What do you think of my PowerPoint presentation?
It's... how can I put this... It's like PowerPoint met an episode of "Threat Level Midnight". Intense. Unforgettable. That's what she said!
Okay... and for the team building on Friday?
I have a GREAT idea. We're all going to... survive in the forest! Well, the park next door. It'll build bonds. Or lawsuits. We'll see!
Hi, I'm having an issue with the API, error 403.
Hello! Error 403 indicates an authentication issue. Please ensure your API key is correct and included in the 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_KEY' header.
Ah right, I forgot the "Bearer". Thanks!
No problem! Let me know if you have other questions. The key is always checking the details, like Pam does with my expense reports!
Can you explain the concept of fine-tuning simply?
Sure! Imagine a master chef (the base model). Fine-tuning is teaching them YOUR secret recipes (your data) so they cook exactly the way YOU want!
Great analogy! And how does it work here?
You provide the ingredients (PDFs, videos...), we teach the chef (OpenAI/Claude) your recipes (Q&A format), and voilà! You have your own specialized star chef!

deployment.headline: Universal Integration
deployment.title: Deploy Your AI Everywhere
deployment.description: Your fine-tuned model is ready to integrate with your favorite tools via API.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently asked questions about FineTuner and personalized AI

questions.question: What is FineTuner?
questions.answer: FineTuner is a SaaS (Software as a Service) platform designed to radically simplify the creation of custom AI assistants. You import your own data (PDF documents, YouTube video transcripts, web pages, knowledge bases, etc.), and our platform transforms it into an optimized dataset. Then, we manage the complex fine-tuning process (specialized re-training) on cutting-edge language models like those from OpenAI (GPT) or Anthropic (Claude). The result is an AI that speaks with your voice, knows your domain, and can be integrated via API into your applications, websites, or internal tools.

questions.question: Do I need an OpenAI or Anthropic account?
questions.answer: Yes, it's essential. FineTuner acts as an orchestrator and facilitator. The fine-tuned model is trained and hosted directly on **your own** OpenAI or Anthropic account. This ensures you retain full ownership and control of your specialized AI model. We guide you to securely connect your account via your API keys, and we handle all the technical steps of fine-tuning on their infrastructure.

questions.question: What types of content can I import?
questions.answer: FineTuner is very flexible. You can import various formats: PDF files, text documents (.txt, .md), paste raw text, provide web page URLs that we will scrape, or even links to YouTube videos (we automatically extract the transcript). Our system analyzes, cleans, and structures this information to create the best possible dataset for training your AI.

questions.question: How does the pricing work?
questions.answer: Our model is based on usage ('Pay-as-you-go') for maximum flexibility. The first 10,000 characters of content you submit for processing (conversion, dataset preparation) are free. Beyond this free quota, each additional character is billed at €0.000365 (excl. tax). There is no fixed monthly subscription or commitment. You only pay for the volume of data you actually process, which is ideal for getting started or for variable needs.

questions.question: Can I integrate my AI on other platforms?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Once your model is fine-tuned on your OpenAI/Anthropic account, you get a unique ID for that model. You can then call it via their standard API. This means you can integrate it wherever you want: chatbots on your website, mobile apps, customer support systems, automation tools (Zapier, Make), CRMs, e-learning platforms, and much more. FineTuner provides you with the ready-to-use model; the integration then depends on your tools.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: The security and confidentiality of your data are our top priority. Your imported content is used solely for the purpose of creating your dataset and fine-tuning YOUR model, on YOUR provider account (OpenAI/Anthropic). We never resell your data or use your information to train other models. You retain full intellectual property rights over your content and the resulting fine-tuned model.

questions.question: Do I need technical skills?
questions.answer: Not at all! That's the whole point of FineTuner. We designed the interface to be intuitive and easy to use, even without any programming or artificial intelligence knowledge. You upload your content, click a few buttons to start the process, and we handle all the technical complexity in the background. You simply retrieve your ready-to-use model ID.

finalCta.headline: Why Is It So Simple?
finalCta.description: FineTuner orchestrates everything: conversion, preparation, training. You focus on the essential: uploading your content and watching your AI come to life.

footer.description: Turn your content into fine-tuned AI in a few clicks. The simplest and most powerful AI technology to create your custom assistant.

example1.question: What are the advantages of your solution compared to the competition?
example1.answer: Our solution stands out with three major advantages: an intuitive interface requiring no training, easy integration with your existing tools, and competitive pricing with no hidden fees. Unlike competitors, we also offer 24/7 customer support included in all our plans.

example2.question: How can I contact customer service?
example2.answer: You can contact our customer service by phone at +1-800-123-4567 Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM, by email at support@example.com, or via live chat on our website. For Premium customers, a dedicated line is available 24/7.

noDatasets.title: No datasets available
noDatasets.description: You haven't created any datasets yet. Datasets are sets of question-answer pairs used for fine-tuning models.

noFineTunings.title: No fine-tunings available
noFineTunings.description: You haven't created any fine-tuned models yet. Fine-tunings allow you to adapt language models to your specific data.

howItWorks.title: How FineTuner Platform Works
howItWorks.intro: FineTuner allows you to create custom AI assistants by fine-tuning language models on your own data. The general process is as follows:

step1.title: 1. Project Creation:
step1.desc: Organize your work into distinct projects.

step2.title: 2. Content Import:
step2.desc: Add your documents, web pages, or YouTube videos. We extract the relevant text.

step3.title: 3. Dataset Creation:
step3.desc: We transform your content into question/answer pairs optimized for fine-tuning.

step4.title: 4. Fine-tuning Launch:
step4.desc: Choose a base model (e.g., GPT-3.5) and launch training on your dataset.

step5.title: 5. Test & Integration:
step5.desc: Test your custom model in the Playground and integrate it into your applications.

howItWorks.conclusion: Fine-tuning adapts the model to your specific style, terminology, and knowledge base, making it much more effective for your use cases.

integration.title: Integrating Your Fine-tuned Models
integration.intro: Once your model is fine-tuned (status "completed"), you can use it in your own applications or workflows.

viaFinetunerApi.title: Via FineTuner API (Recommended)
viaFinetunerApi.description: We will soon provide a dedicated API endpoint to easily interact with your fine-tuned models hosted on FineTuner. This will simplify integration and management.

viaProviderApi.title: Via Provider API (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
viaProviderApi.description: You can directly use the provider's API (e.g., OpenAI) using your fine-tuned model ID. You can find this ID on your Fine-tuning details page or in the Playground.
viaProviderApi.codeExample:
import openai

openai.api_key = 'YOUR_OPENAI_API_KEY'

response = openai.Completion.create(
  model="YOUR_FINETUNED_MODEL_ID", # Replace with your model ID
  prompt="Your prompt here...",
  max_tokens=150
)

print(response.choices[0].text.strip())

viaAutomation.title: Via Zapier / Make / Other Automation Platforms
viaAutomation.description1: Most automation platforms (Zapier, Make, n8n, etc.) offer native integrations with OpenAI or allow making generic HTTP API calls.
viaAutomation.description2: You can use the "OpenAI Completion" action (or equivalent) by specifying your fine-tuned model ID in the "Model" field. You will need your OpenAI API key.
viaAutomation.description3: If direct integration is not available, use the "Webhook" or "HTTP Request" action to call the provider's API as described above.
viaAutomation.docsNote: Refer to the documentation of your preferred automation platform for the exact configuration.

qualityDescription.insufficient: Insufficient data: The model will struggle to generate consistent answers.
qualityDescription.minimal: Minimal quality: Basic answers with limited context.
qualityDescription.good: Good quality: Accurate and well-contextualized answers.
qualityDescription.optimal: Optimal quality: Detailed and highly personalized answers.
qualityDescription.excessive: Data beyond optimal: Additional benefits may diminish.
